name: 阮于軒　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：1. 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，2. 拉譜拉斯轉換，3. 特殊函數。
This course intends to introduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1.Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher order ODEs. 2. Laplace transform, 3. Special function.
schedule:
第 1 週 　　Reviews
第 2 週 　　1.1Basic Concepts and Ideas/1.2 Geometrical Meaning of y’=f (x, y)   
第 3 週 　　1.3 Separable Differential Eq.
第 4 週 　　1.4 Exact ODES/1.5 Linear ODEs
第 5 週 　　2.1 Homogeous Linear ODEs. of Second Order/2.2 Homogeous Linear ODEs with Constant Coefficients
第 6 週 　　2.5 Euler-Cauchy Eq./2.6 Existence and Uniqueness of Solutions
第 7 週 　　2.7 Nonhomogeous ODEs/2.10 Solution by Variation of Parameters
第 8 週 　　3.1 Homogenous Linear ODEs of High Orders/3.2 Homogeous Linear Eq. of High Orders with Constant Coefficients/3.3 Nonhomogeous Linear ODEs of High Orders
第 9 週 　　期中測驗
第 10 週 　　5.1 Power Series Method.
第 11 週 　　5.2 Theory of the Power Series Method.
第 12 週 　　5.3 Legendre’s Equation; Legendre Polynomials P n (x)./5.4 Frobenius Method.
第 13 週 　　5.5 Bessel’s Equation. Bessel Functions J v (x).
第 14 週 　　6.1 Laplace Transform
第 15 週 　　6.2 Transforms of Derivatives and Integrals. ODEs.
第 16 週 　　6.3 Unit Step Function/6.4 Short Impulses
第 17 週 　　6.5 Convolution. Integral Equations/6.6 Differentiation and Integration of Transforms   
第 18 週 　　期末考試
scorePolicy:
